args(av_get)

appleDF <- av_get(symbol = "AAPL", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_DAILY", interval = "daily")
alphabetDF <- av_get(symbol = "GOOGL", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_DAILY", interval = "daily")

### Opening share price

```{r fig.width=15}
ggplot() + 
geom_line(data = amazonDF, aes(timestamp, open, color = "red")) + 
geom_line(data = appleDF, aes(timestamp, open, colour = "blue")) + 
geom_line(data = alphabetDF, aes(timestamp, open, colour = "green")) +  
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + 
xlab("Timestamp") + ylab("Value") +
scale_color_discrete(name = "Company", labels = c("Amazon", "Apple", "Alphabet"))
```
